title: [QUESTION] error NU1202 on some machines when building with SkiaSharp 1.68.3
body:
We face a strange problem.

On some machines, when building our solution, we get `error NU1202: Package SkiaSharp 1.68.3 is not compatible with .NET Standard 2.0`

Using `SkiaSharp 1.68.2.1` fixes the issue.

I have no idea what is going on, I'm digging deeper, but maybe someone here has a hint?

Thanks,
Peter
